justifications: Measures the crucial healthy communication dynamics of active listening and showing interest.
Captures the crucial communication skill of active listening, which is distinct from the potential to talk about anything (IT44).
This is a component of the broader concept in IT44 ('I feel I can talk to him about anything'). IT44 is more powerful.
Redundant with IT44; semantic overlap in communication.
Indispensable for communication; clear.
Strong for communication; distinct after drops.

justifications: A foundational item measuring the core feelings of safety and comfort, the bedrock of a healthy relationship.
Arguably the most fundamental indicator of a healthy, non-abusive relationship. A cornerstone item.
This is a foundational item for a healthy relationship, representing the absolute baseline of emotional and physical safety.
Core to safety; clear and essential.

justifications: Measures respect for autonomy specifically regarding time management, a good contrast to coercive control tactics.
Excellent concept. Rephrase to be more behavioral for greater strength, e.g., 'Rispetta le mie scelte su come gestisco il mio tempo.'
A concise and clear item that directly assesses respect for personal autonomy over one's time, the opposite of coercive control.
Redundant with IT04; similar autonomy focus.
Core but redundant with IT04 on personal space.
Indispensable for autonomy; no remaining overlap.
Essential time autonomy indicator
Redundant with IT04, similar autonomy concept
Highly redundant with autonomy items; same concept different context
Duplicate with IT04; IT04 stronger wording.
Captures behavioral autonomy distinct from emotional space.

evidence_against: 'Mi fa sentire' is weaker phrasing than a direct behavioral statement.
